response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our top-of-the-line product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I estimate its value to be far beyond $10,000. However, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15,000. This offer is designed to ensure you have the opportunity to experience the benefits of this remarkable product while also securing a favorable deal. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 15000}
